name: MetaArena
description:
This game is an Arcade Game

You will have the lobby where you can modify your weapon adding modules

Use the joystick to teleport in the scene

Grab your weapon and cut portals to teleport in the Arena

Collect All Crystals to have more weapon add-on

Come back in Arena for unlimited battle against monsters

Scores are saved but not showed yet

I'm aware for the issue that collecting crystal doesn't work.

you can take the file "save.json" and put it in :

 C:\Users\Username\AppData\LocalLow\Username\MetaArena

In World> Forest, change "Succeed" from false to true

On player, Crystal : "Forest" instead of none

You will have the crystal and can use the gun

You can also unlock the 2nd battlefield of Forest and have unlimited wave of spiders.

Sorry for this, I hope I can fix it quick !
